name: Machine God Uprising: Revenge of Giga Boy
name_original: Machine God Uprising: Revenge of Giga Boy
description:
In the distant year 2XXX,

a super computer was created.

However, soon after it released a deadly virus

and took control over mankind.

Only a handful of survivors remain, 

now it's up to you to defeat the vile A.I!

Made for Aalto University - Game Project course as a Clone Game of a sequel to a certain classic platformer game.
